name: MEV Capital Pendle WBTC
description: The Pendle WBTC vault curated by MEV Capital is dedicated to providing capital to the BTC LSTs PT markets from Pendle. This vault serves correlated markets only and aims to optimize both liquidation risk management and APR from leverage loopers. Morpho Vaults are curated lending vaults that can allocate deposits to any number of Morpho Markets. Each vault is customizable and has a different risk profile. Curators are independent, third-party risk experts who use their expertise to offer various Morpho Vaults.
